totem.edit.editorder.info=Here you can edit each section of the totem.
* You can change the display order of the sections with a simple drag / drop
* By clicking the edit section, you can change the type of the section, its title and the bottom display.
 * By clicking on Edit elements of this section, you can choose the elements that constitute this section, add, remove, etc.

 totem.edit.editblock.button=Edit this section totem.edit.editblocksource.button=Edit elements of this section totem.edit.editblocksource.help=Please choose the edit mode, simple or advanced. The simple mode allow you to select which content to use from content specifically created for the Totem. The advanced mode allow you to choose the source of content to be used from the available Applications. totem.edit.editblock.help=Please configure the block. You can choose among multiple presentation methods available, including Carrousel, List or Simple Text.
